channel.title: CVE Feed for alpitronic -- Hypercharger EV Charger
channel.description: The latest CVEs for alpitronic -- Hypercharger EV Charger

item.title: CVE-2024-4622|2024-05-15T16:54:08.150Z -- alpitronic -- Hypercharger EV Charger
item.description: If misconfigured, alpitronic Hypercharger EV charging devices can expose a web interface protected by authentication. If the default credentials are not changed, an attacker can use public knowledge to access the device as an administrator.
